headline: 1 Healthcare Stock to Hold Forever and 2 to Ignore
summary: Personal health and wellness is one of the many secular tailwinds for healthcare companies. Despite the rosy long-term prospects, short-term headwinds such as COVID inventory destocking have harmed the industry’s returns - over the past six months, healthcare stocks have collectively shed 1.7%. This performance is a noticeable divergence from the S&P 500’s 8.9% return.
